title: You Are Mine
description: Hustler. Layla's hustling days have come to an end. Hospitalized after a deal gone wrong, she's ready to leave that life behind. But sometimes your past can come back to haunt you.Her parents' killers is back, and Layla's his next target. But Layla refuses to back down. This time, she will fight back. Taylor's life hasn't been a bed of roses, and Layla is the bright spot he never expected. Layla comes with her own baggage though and Taylor is determined to never let her go, even if his life depends on it. You Are Mine is the second book in the FOREVER series by Alla Kar bestselling author of Make Me Yours - a sexy new adult romance about letting go of your past and embracing your future.
author: Alla Kar
